snippet: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe is delighted to be in the mix for the "ultimate job" of managing England but remains committed to his Premier League club....

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe is delighted to be in the mix for the "ultimate job" of managing England but remains committed to his Premier League club.

snippet: Stoke captain Ryan Shawcross was surprised Liverpool let Joe Allen leave after the Welsh midfielder shone at the Euro 2016 tournament and prepares to return to Anfield for the first time when the Potters face the Merseyside club on Tuesday....

headline.main: Shawcross Hopes Surprise Recruit Allen Can Haunt Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Shawcross Hopes Surprise Recruit Allen Can Haunt Liverpool

lead_paragraph: Stoke captain Ryan Shawcross was surprised Liverpool let Joe Allen leave after the Welsh midfielder shone at the Euro 2016 tournament and prepares to return to Anfield for the first time when the Potters face the Merseyside club on Tuesday.

snippet: Sam Allardyce is the obvious candidate to replace Roy Hodgson as England manager if the FA decide to go with a home-grown candidate for the job, former Manchester United boss Alex Ferguson has said....

headline.print_headline: Ferguson Backs Allardyce as Homegrown England Boss

lead_paragraph: Sam Allardyce is the obvious candidate to replace Roy Hodgson as England manager if the FA decide to go with a home-grown candidate for the job, former Manchester United boss Alex Ferguson has said.

snippet: The new managers of Manchester United and Manchester City will face an early confrontation when the teams meet in a friendly in Beijing on July 25....

snippet: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal has urged Marouane Fellaini to keep his aggression in check but said the midfielder's violent reaction which got him banned for three matches by the Football Association was normal....

snippet: Injured Everton captain Phil Jagielka will miss the next two Premier League games and is a doubt for the FA Cup semi-final at Wembley on April 23 as pressure builds on manager Roberto Martinez to deliver....

headline.main: Everton Sweat on Jagielka Fitness Ahead of FA Cup Semis
headline.print_headline: Everton Sweat on Jagielka Fitness Ahead of FA Cup Semis

lead_paragraph: Injured Everton captain Phil Jagielka will miss the next two Premier League games and is a doubt for the FA Cup semi-final at Wembley on April 23 as pressure builds on manager Roberto Martinez to deliver.

snippet: Newcastle was beaten, 3-0, by host Everton to stay third from bottom in the Premier League standings....
abstract: Everton defeats Newcastle, 3-0; other soccer matches and news noted.

snippet: The lure of reaching the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time will weigh heavily on Manuel Pellegrini's mind as Manchester City and Chelsea prepare for a heavyweight FA Cup fifth-round clash on Sunday....

headline.main: Depleted Man City Face Chelsea in FA Cup Showdown
headline.print_headline: Depleted Man City Face Chelsea in FA Cup Showdown

lead_paragraph: The lure of reaching the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time will weigh heavily on Manuel Pellegrini's mind as Manchester City and Chelsea prepare for a heavyweight FA Cup fifth-round clash on Sunday.

snippet: Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid's passage to the Champions League final and Sevilla qualifying for the Europa League equivalent for a third straight year has underlined Spain's dominance of European soccer....

headline.main: Why Spanish Clubs Are Ruling Europe Yet Again
headline.print_headline: Why Spanish Clubs Are Ruling Europe Yet Again

lead_paragraph: Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid's passage to the Champions League final and Sevilla qualifying for the Europa League equivalent for a third straight year has underlined Spain's dominance of European soccer.
